org.hps.detector.ecal

Class Transformations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.detector.ecal.Transformations

  • public final class Transformations
extends Object
    Performs vector transformations to calculate center of crystal volume from front and back positions as defined in the conditions database.

      • Transformations

        public Transformations(double[] trans,
                       double[] rot)
        Create a new Transformations object.
        Parameters:
        trans - translation in space as an array containing [x,y,z] coordinates
        rot - rotation in space as an array with angles [alpha, beta, gamma] or [rx, ry, rz]
